job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} if (! -r .sl64_gcc492) ln -s ../../.sl64_gcc492 . # cd $SCRATCH # pwd setenv STARFPE NO # setenv NODEBUG yes # setup gcc # setup 32b # starver DEV2/SL15 set filelist = `cat $FILELIST | awk '{print $1}'` echo "file list = ${filelist}" set NL = `echo ${filelist} | wc -l` echo "NL = ${NL}" if (${NL} == 0) exit 0; foreach input ( ${filelist} ) echo ${input} | grep ':' if (! $?) then set dir = `echo ${input} | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set tag = `echo ${input} | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` else exit 1; endif set log = ${tag}.log # if (-r ${log}) exit 0; if (! -r "${tag}.picoDst.root") then root.exe -q -b 'lMuDst.C(-1,"'${dir}'/'${tag}'*.MuDst.root","StEvent,RMuDst,mysql,tpcDb,eemcDb,magF,nodefault,CorrX,TRGDef,mtdMatch,mtdCalib,eemcD,emcAtoE,PreEcl,Epc,trgSim,picoDST")' makePicoDst.C+ >& ${log} endif end
